lines.text: Can't get away with it, Mike.
You accusin' me or askin' me?

[leaving the party,to Maria sarcastically]
We're not staying for the fireworks, thank you!

[contemptuously aloud to her friend about Maria]
If it wasn't for her money, she'd be hanging out of a tenement window somewhere chewing on a string of garlic.
What these other girls got that Maria hasn't got?
Respectable fathers. You think you can put Maria over like... tooth paste or chewing gum. You know, being your daughter is no cinch. I wouldn't want the job.
I don't wanta be your father either.
Having me around is giving you a sense of humor, Mike.

[to Mike]
Mike Palmero, you're a disgrace to your nationality! I'm through with you!
